description: This resource schema represents the RepositoryAssociation resource in the Amazon CodeGuru Reviewer service.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. The allowed characters across services are: letters, numbers, and spaces representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: Name of the repository to be associated.
Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the repository to be associated.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^\S[\w.-]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.description: The type of repository to be associated.
Type.markdownDescription:
The type of repository to be associated.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CodeCommit | Bitbucket | GitHubEnterpriseServer | S3Bucket  
Update requires: Replacement

Owner.description: The owner of the repository. For a Bitbucket repository, this is the username for the account that owns the repository.
Owner.markdownDescription:
The owner of the repository. For a Bitbucket repository, this is the username for the account that owns the repository.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^\S(.*\S)?$  
Update requires: Replacement

BucketName.description: The name of the S3 bucket associated with an associated S3 repository. It must start with `codeguru-reviewer-`.
BucketName.markdownDescription:
The name of the S3 bucket associated with an associated S3 repository. It must start with `codeguru-reviewer-`.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^\S(.*\S)?$  
Update requires: Replacement

ConnectionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS CodeStar Connections connection.
ConnectionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS CodeStar Connections connection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:.+:.+:[0-9]{12}:.+  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: The tags associated with a repository association.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags associated with a repository association.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

AssociationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository association.
AssociationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository association.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:.+:.+:[0-9]{12}:.+  
Update requires: No interruption
